sem:triple.sem:subject: /en/odo
sem:triple.sem:object: Odo, played by René Auberjonois, is a major character in the science fiction television series Star Trek: Deep Space Nine. He is a member of a fictional shapeshifting race called Changelings and serves as the head of security for the space station Deep Space Nine on which the show is set. Odo wages a never-ending war on Quark, his bar, and his variety of illegal activities.

resource.name: Odo
resource.description: Odo, played by René Auberjonois, is a major character in the science fiction television series Star Trek: Deep Space Nine. Odo wages a never-ending war on Quark, his bar, and his variety of illegal activities.
